gantt.resourceCantBeMovedUnderAnotherTas: The resource row can't be moved under anothe Task !
gantt.theElementCantBeMovedHere: The element can't be moved here !
gantt.createNewTaskRowUnderTheSelectedTa: Create new task row under the selected task category.
gantt.addResourceToTheSelectedTask: Add resource row to the selected task row.
acceptTheLicense: I accept the software license agreement and I have read and understand the cookie policy.
gantt.description: G A N T T application.
gantt.openEditElementWindow: Open / Close the element editor window.
gantt.generateImage: Generate image from the current view.
gantt.selectTheQualityOfTheGenImage: Select the quality of the generated image. 10 is the best quality.
gantt.specifyTheTimeUnitQuantity: Specify the time unit quantity. Like if your base unit is day I would set it up to 8 (hours).
gantt.specifyTheTimeUnitQuantityUnit: Specify the time unit quantity unit. Like if your base unit is day I would set it up to (8) hours.
gantt.showDepAndConstTags: Show / Hide the dependeny and constraint tags.
gantt.taskTimeElementActiveInactiveSwitc: Activate / Inactivate the column under this task time element.
gantt.resourceTimeElementActiveInactiveS: Activate / Inactivate this resource time element.
gantt.selectTheDateForTheTimeline: Select the base date for the timeline.
gantt.selectTheBaseTimeUnitForTheTimelin: Select the base time unit for the timeline.
gantt.timeUnitPercentageForWorkResources: Time unit percentage for work resources under this element.
gantt.changeFillColorTasks: Change the fill color of the tasks in this row.
gantt.changeFillColorTaskTimeElements: Change the fill color of the task time elements in this row.
gantt.changeFillColorConstraint: Change the fill color of the selected constraint.
gantt.selectTheConstraintConType: Select the connection type of the constraint.
gantt.changeLineWidth: Change the width of the line.
gantt.changeFillColorDependency: Change the fill color of the selected dependency.
gantt.selectDependencyTimeTape: Select the time relation of the dependency.
gantt.valueForLeadOrLag: Specify the value for the Lead or Lag time.
gantt.overrideFillColorResourceTimeEleme: Override the original color of the resource in this resource row.
gantt.changeFillColorResource: Change the fill color of the resource.
gantt.overrideFillColorTask: Override the fill color of the task.
gantt.overrideFillColorTaskTimeElement: Override the fill color of the task time element.
gantt.changeFillColorResourceRow: Change the fill color of the resource row.
gantt.overrideFillColorResourceTimeEleme: Change the fill color of the resource time element.
gantt.deleteElement: Delete the selected element. You can use the delete key as well.
gantt.createNewTaskTimeElement: Create new task time element here.
gantt.deleteTaskTimeElement: Delete task time element. You can use the delete key as well.
gantt.dragResource: You can reorder the resources with this.
gantt.resourceName: Name of the resource. Like waiter, money, bread.
gantt.resourceUnit: Name of the resource unit. Like piece, USD, kg.
gantt.selectResourceType: Select the type of the resource.
gantt.resourceHeightInRows: The height of the resource in rows.
gantt.goToGanttDrawPage: Go to the G A N T T draw page.
